casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kevin GOLPHIN & Tilmon Golphin. No. 441A98-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Geoffrey W. Hosford, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Kevin Salvador Golphin. Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of May 2004 by Defendant to Deem Petition for Writ of Certiorari Timely Filed:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
